data.message:
Hey MM, I'm Leah AKA DJ Head. This might sound weird but you're haunting my thoughts a little lol. I'd love to be a pen pal/friend. I'm starting college for my bachelor's degree in music production on Sept 25th. I've produced a few track. But I'd love to correspond with you if you have any free time. Thanks for all the inspiration. You are an impeccable artist. Hope to hear back Mr Rap God lol
Leah D.
